modName: Skyrim - Unique Locations The Sad Troll
summary: Adds a replica of the famous oblivion easter egg into skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This a sad tale of a troll.

This is a near perfect replica of the troll easter egg in oblivion.

===Features====
-100% replica of the troll note under the bridge
-Note namer is the same as oblivions
-Troll skull and goats skulls under the bridge
-Fun to find and has some bridge toll money from the trolls work

===Spoiler===
Under one of the bridges next to a whiterun farm.
author: Countercruel
